scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run dev" "cd web && bun run dev"
scripts.build:standalone: bun run build:web && bun build src/index.ts web/dist/**/* --compile --external @duckdb/node-api --external @duckdb/node-bindings/* --outfile ./dist/psyduck --sourcemap
scripts.build:standalone:linux: bun run build:web && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --external @duckdb/node-api --external @duckdb/node-bindings/* src/index.ts web/dist/**/* --outfile ./dist/psyduck-linux --sourcemap
scripts.build:standalone:win: bun run build:web && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --external @duckdb/node-api --external @duckdb/node-bindings/* src/index.ts web/dist/**/* --outfile ./dist/psyduck-windows.exe --sourcemap
scripts.build:standalone:macos: bun run build:web && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --external @duckdb/node-api --external @duckdb/node-bindings/* src/index.ts web/dist/**/* --outfile ./dist/psyduck-macos --sourcemap
scripts.build:standalone:all: bun run build:standalone && bun run build:standalone:linux && bun run build:standalone:win && bun run build:standalone:macos
